structure.unit: Fences, Fence Viewers, Pounds And Field Drivers

law.catch_line: Fees Of Field Driver And Pound Keeper
law.text: A city by vote of its city council, approved in accordance with the provisions of its charter, and a town by order adopted by the selectmen or town meeting members, may establish, and from time to time amend, a scale of fees to be paid a field driver for sheep, goats and for other beasts taken up by him, and a scale of fees to be paid a pound keeper for animals impounded in the pound.
